mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REAL_FEED (ID, MEMBER_ID, PLAN_ID) VALUES(#{id}, #{memberId}, #{planId})
mapper.select: SELECT g.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, g.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_REAL_FEED g JOIN TBL_FEED f ON g.ID = f.ID ORDER BY f.CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT g.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, g.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_REAL_FEED g JOIN TBL_FEED f ON g.ID = f.ID WHERE g.ID = #{id} ORDER BY f.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT f.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, s.REAL_STAR, r.MEMBER_ID, r.PLAN_ID FROM TBL_FEED f JOIN TBL_REAL_FEED r ON f.ID = r.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REAL_STAR s ON f.ID = s.FEED_ID WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT f.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, s.REAL_STAR, r.MEMBER_ID, r.PLAN_ID FROM TBL_FEED f JOIN TBL_REAL_FEED r ON f.ID = r.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REAL_STAR s ON f.ID = s.FEED_ID WHERE f.ID = #{id}
